tool_description: Best and easy way to export Thunderbird email to Outlook PST format.
title: Thunderbird to Outlook Converter

api_list.name: Download Now
api_list.description: Download and Enjoy Unlimited Migration From Thunderbird to Outlook
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://thunderbird-to-outlook-converter.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "thunderbird-to-outlook-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
